blogs.title: Angular
blogs.description: Angular is a platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript.

blogs.title: React
blogs.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, maintained by Facebook and a community of developers.

blogs.title: Vue.js
blogs.description: Vue.js is a progressive JavaScript framework used for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

blogs.title: Node.js
blogs.description: Node.js is a runtime environment that allows executing JavaScript code on the server side, using the V8 engine.

blogs.title: Django
blogs.description: Django is a high-level Python web framework that promotes rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

blogs.title: Flask
blogs.description: Flask is a micro web framework for Python based on Werkzeug and Jinja2, suitable for building small applications.

blogs.title: Spring Boot
blogs.description: Spring Boot is an extension of the Spring framework that simplifies the development of new Spring applications.

blogs.title: Ruby on Rails
blogs.description: Ruby on Rails is a server-side web application framework written in Ruby, promoting convention over configuration.

blogs.title: Laravel
blogs.description: Laravel is a PHP framework designed for web application development, known for its elegant syntax and features.

blogs.title: ASP.NET Core
blogs.description: ASP.NET Core is a cross-platform, high-performance framework for building modern, cloud-enabled, Internet-connected applications.
